sentence.Network_en: His design was infinitely better than anything I could have done.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的设计比我所能设计出的不知要好上多少倍。

sentence.Network_en: A centimeter can be infinitely divided into smaller units.
sentence.Network_cn: 一厘米可以无穷尽地分成更小的单位。

sentence.Network_en: We realize that we are infinitely small within the scheme of things.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们认识到在大千世界中我们极其渺小。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 考博英语词汇 ... infinite adj． 无穷的 infinitely ad. 无限地，无边地 infinity n． 无限的时间或空间.

二、无限序列(Infinite Sequence)  设函数f之定义域N为所有自然数时,则称f为一无限序列,由于其函数值可以依序而列出为f(1),f(2), …f(n), …,且其.

entry.def: If you describe something as infinite, you are emphasizing that it is extremely great in amount or degree.

example.ex: With infinite care, John shifted position...
example.tran: 约翰小心翼翼地挪动了位置。

entry.def: Something that is infinite has no limit, end, or edge.

example.ex: Obviously, no company has infinite resources.
example.tran: 显然,没有哪个公司的资源是无限的。

auth_sentence.content: Or, if not secret, then infinitely variable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Or, if not secret, then infinitely variable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Or, if not secret, then infinitely variable.

auth_sentence.content: Another mind...infinitely more precise and scrutinizing than his own.
auth_sentence.res_content: Another mind...infinitely more precise and scrutinizing than his own.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Another mind...infinitely more precise and scrutinizing than his own.

auth_sentence.content: We enjoyed our scrambling meal infinitely more than...our dinner.
auth_sentence.res_content: We enjoyed our scrambling meal infinitely more than...our dinner.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We enjoyed our scrambling meal infinitely more than...our dinner.

sentences.en: He argued that all matter was infinitely divisible.
sentences.cn: 他坚持所有物质都可无限地分。

sentences.en: Human beings are infinitely flexible and able to adjust when survival depends on it.
sentences.cn: 人类的适应能力是无穷尽的，为了生存可以适应任何环境。
